name: Toko
text: On Play You may trash 2 cards with the {Wano Country} type from your hand. If your life is 1 or less, add 1 card from the top of your deck to the top of your life.

effect.text: You may trash 2 cards with the {Wano Country} type from your hand. If your life is 1 or less, add 1 card from the top of your deck to the top of your life.
targets: 2 cards with the {Wano Country} type from your hand
1 card from the top of your deck

meta.notes: Rarity 'C' is confirmed from the bottom right corner of the card.
